channel.title: MoparSevers - How to get players
channel.description:
Hello.
My question is, how to open your server for other players. I klick Start Server, then i click on Enter and I log in with an Username and a Password. Good. Then i try to relog and it works. I change IP to for exmple "saletana.no-ip.biz" and when i try to login in this Ip with my old Username and old password, it doesnt work. It means server is down. Then: can sumone explain me step by step how to open it? I dont want to publish first of all i only want that for example by brother can join it.
BTW i used the downloaded MoparScape client. Do i need to do it with the moparisthebest.com client on moparscap.org or is it totaly the same excapt the point, that u need to start the web to get in the moparisthebest.com client? Thank you ;)

item.title: MoparSevers - How to get players
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Saletana:

Then: can sumone explain me step by step how to open it?

Hmmm…Something like a tutorial?

Who would have ever thought of that? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: MoparSevers - How to get players
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

Hello.

My question is, how to open your server for other players. I klick Start Server, then i click on Enter and I log in with an Username and a Password. Good. Then i try to relog and it works. I change IP to for exmple “saletana.no-ip.biz” and when i try to login in this Ip with my old Username and old password, it doesnt work. It means server is down. Then: can sumone explain me step by step how to open it? I dont want to publish first of all i only want that for example by brother can join it.

BTW i used the downloaded MoparScape client. Do i need to do it with the moparisthebest.com client on moparscap.org or is it totaly the same excapt the point, that u need to start the web to get in the moparisthebest.com client?
Thank you

Read full topic
